doc:
J. Madison Wright Morris https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._Madison_Wright_Morris 0 Jessica Madison Wright Morris (July 29, 1984 – July 21, 2006), known professionally as J. Madison Wright, was an American actress. Born in Cincinnati, she spent her early years being raised in Lexington, Kentucky. She was best known for her role as Sam Wallace in Shiloh. She co-starred in Shiloh with her younger sister Tori Wright. Jessica_Madison_Wright_Morris ( July_29_,_1984 – July_21_,_2006 ) , known professionally as J._Madison_Wright , was an_American_actress . Born in Cincinnati , she spent her_early_years being_raised in Lexington , Kentucky . She was_best_known for her_role as Sam_Wallace in Shiloh . She co-starred in Shiloh with her_younger_sister_Tori_Wright .
